briefdescription.para: Clear the data from the records stored on the server.
Get the type of records in the read worldstate's dynamic records.

simplesect.para: The type of records (0 for SPELL, 1 for POTION, 2 for ENCHANTMENT, 3 for NPC).

briefdescription.para: Get the number of records in the read worldstate's dynamic records.
Get the number of effects for the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.
Get the id of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the base id (i.e. the id this record should inherit default values from) of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

simplesect.para: The base id of the record.

briefdescription.para: Get the subtype of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the name of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the model of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the icon of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the script of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the enchantment id of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

simplesect.para: The enchantment id of the record.

briefdescription.para: Get the enchantment charge of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

simplesect.para: The enchantment charge of the record.

briefdescription.para: Get the auto-calculation flag value of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

simplesect.para: The auto-calculation flag value of the record.

briefdescription.para: Get the charge of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the cost of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the flags of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

simplesect.para: The flags of the spell as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Get the value of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.
Get the weight of the record at a certain index in the read worldstate's dynamic records of the current type.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectId

briefdescription.para: Get the ID of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectAttribute

briefdescription.para: Get the ID of the attribute modified by the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

simplesect.para: The attribute ID for the effect.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectSkill

briefdescription.para: Get the ID of the skill modified by the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

simplesect.para: The skill ID for the effect.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectRangeType

briefdescription.para: Get the range type of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records (0 for self, 1 for touch, 2 for target).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectArea

briefdescription.para: Get the area of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectDuration

briefdescription.para: Get the duration of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectMagnitudeMax

briefdescription.para: Get the maximum magnitude of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

simplesect.para: The maximum magnitude of the effect.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int recordIndex, unsigned int effectIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetRecordEffectMagnitudeMin

briefdescription.para: Get the minimum magnitude of the effect at a certain index in the read worldstate's current records.

simplesect.para: The minimum magnitude of the effect.

briefdescription.para: Set which type of temporary records stored on the server should have their data changed via setter functions.
Set the id of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the base id (i.e. the id this record should inherit default values from) of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the inventory base id (i.e. the id this record should inherit its inventory contents from) of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the subtype of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the name of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the model of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the icon of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the script of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the enchantment id of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The enchantment id of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the enchantment charge of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the auto-calculation flag value of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The auto-calculation flag value of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the charge of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the cost of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the flags of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the value of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the weight of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the armor rating of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The armor rating of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the health of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int minDamage, unsigned int maxDamage) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetRecordDamageChop

briefdescription.para: Set the chop damage of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The minimum damage of the record.
The maximum damage of the record.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int minDamage, unsigned int maxDamage) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetRecordDamageSlash

briefdescription.para: Set the slash damage of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The minimum damage of the record.
The maximum damage of the record.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int minDamage, unsigned int maxDamage) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetRecordDamageThrust

briefdescription.para: Set the thrust damage of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The minimum damage of the record.
The maximum damage of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the reach of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the speed of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set whether the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type is a key.

detaileddescription.para: Note: This is only applicable to Miscellaneous records.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the record is a key.

briefdescription.para: Set whether the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type is a scroll.

detaileddescription.para: Note: This is only applicable to Book records.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the record is a scroll.

briefdescription.para: Set the skill ID of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The skill ID of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the text of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the hair of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the head of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the gender of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type (0 for female, 1 for male).
Set the race of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the character class of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The character class of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the faction of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the level of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the magicka of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the fatigue of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.
Set the AI fight value of the temporary record stored on the server for the currently specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The AI fight value of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the id of the record at a certain index in the records stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: When resending a received RecordsDynamic packet, this allows you to set the server-generated id of a record without having to clear and recreate the packet.

briefdescription.para: Set the enchantment id of the record at a certain index in the records stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: When resending a received RecordsDynamic packet, this allows you to set the server-generated enchantment id of a record without having to clear and recreate the packet.

parameterdescription.para: The enchantment id of the record.

briefdescription.para: Set the ID of the temporary effect stored on the server.
Set the ID of the attribute modified by the temporary effect stored on the server.
Set the ID of the skill modified by the temporary effect stored on the server.
Set the range type of the temporary effect stored on the server (0 for self, 1 for touch, 2 for target).

parameterdescription.para: The range type of the effect.

briefdescription.para: Set the area of the temporary effect stored on the server.
Set the duration of the temporary effect stored on the server.
Set the maximum magnitude of the temporary effect stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum magnitude of the effect.

briefdescription.para: Set the minimum magnitude of the temporary effect stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The minimum magnitude of the effect.

briefdescription.para: Set the type of the temporary body part stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the body part.

briefdescription.para: Set the id of the male version of the temporary body part stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the body part.

briefdescription.para: Set the id of the female version of the temporary body part stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the body part.

briefdescription.para: Set the id of the of the temporary inventory item stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the inventory item.

briefdescription.para: Set the count of the of the temporary inventory item stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The count of the inventory item.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary record of the current specified type to the stored records.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary record will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary effect to the temporary record of the current specified type.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary effect will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary body part to the temporary record of the current specified type.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary body part will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary inventory item to the temporary record of the current specified type.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary inventory item will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.
Note: Any items added this way will be ignored if the record already has a valid inventoryBaseId.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendRecordDynamic

briefdescription.para: Send a RecordDynamic packet with the current specified record type.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.
Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).
